title: LoL SO SLOW NOW
body:
Today I went to open LoL and when I logged in the client took about 3 minutes to login, normally around 5 seconds? Again afterwards the chat service didn't even connect whilst when I went to start a game (Just normals 5x5) the chat box in champ select didn't even work and it came blank, the time it took to start a queue also took around 1 minute saying "Retrieving Data From Server". Normally it takes less than a second >.<. Does anyone have the same issue? 

Fyi this has never happened for me

replies.body: Just checked speedtest.net. Its TPGs fault. Must have been the storm.
Yeah just played a game. Steady 210 ping. I normally get 30. TPG internet, Melbourne.
